name: express-recap
description: Express app connecting to Kafka, Elasticsearch, Redis, and PostgreSQL

scripts.docker: sudo docker compose down -v && sudo docker compose up -d && sleep 30 && curl -X POST 'http://localhost:9200/_security/user/kibana_system/_password' -u elastic:mojak2525 -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"password":"mojak2525"}' && sudo docker compose restart kibana
scripts.docker:keep-data: sudo docker compose down && sudo docker compose up -d && sleep 30 && sudo docker compose restart kibana
